transcript:
Customer: Mangal Bhavan Amangal Hari
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha sir sir Deepak se baat kar raha hun India Mart se
Customer: Ha bataiye sir
Executive: Kal aapne call kiya tha sir
Customer: Ha ha kiya tha
Executive: Kya problem thi sir
Customer: Sir problem ke regarding nahi kiya tha maine package ke bare mein kiya tha
Executive: Accha accha package ke bare mein kiya tha na
Customer: Ha package lene ke bare mein
Executive: Accha lekin abhi aapka Jay Granules ke chal raha hai na Jay Granules ke naam se ek account yaha pe
Customer: O o o mera partner hai theek hai
Executive: O o nahi mujhe mujhe separate form ke liye chahiye
Customer: Ha jo aapne dusra mere ko bheja tha uske liye chahiye tha na
Executive: Ha
Customer: Okay
Executive: Okay
Customer: Theek hai main abhi ek kaam karta hun main isme aapka kar deta hun kya kehte hain aapne mere ko whatsapp bheja hai na apna visiting card vagaira maine dekh liya hai
Customer: Ha ha
Executive: Ha to main aapko karta hun thodi der mein aur ek bar isme pata kar lu kya kya hai aapki categories vagaira hai aur ya fir ek bar main video meet pe aapko bula ke aapko dikha dunga kya kya chal raha hai
Customer: Sir dekhiye dekhiye ye mera naya business hai theek hai mujhe genuine inquiry chahiye ha package lu to
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul wo main ek bar aapko dikha dunga
Customer: Baad mein baad mein fir usme dikkat aati hai sir ko matlab aap aap mere yaha par jo mera address hai yaha Jetpur ka aapka koi banda idhar matlab mere ko samjhane ke liye aa sakta hai
Executive: Main check karwata hun ek bar
Customer: Ha wo sir thoda karwaiye mujhe thoda knowledge dijiye kitni inquiry aayegi ek mahine mein wo thoda confirmation dijiye theek hai package karwana hai mujhe
Executive: Theek hai main ek bar karata hun aapko aur main bola tha ye aapne jo call kiya tha kal mere is wale number pe aapne online search karke call kiya tha na
Customer: Ha ha
Executive: Ji aap ha abhi aap mera jo whatsapp wala number hai usko save kar lijiye aage se aapko Jay Granules ya kisi bhi cheez ke liye kaam ho to aap mere ko direct personal number pe call kar lijiye theek hai
Customer: Ha kya hai sir
Executive: Ha is wale ka main ye cancel raise hua hai to main isko yaha se close kara deta hun aapne jo call kiya hai uske liye theek hai
Customer: Ha ha
Executive: Aur main abhi aapko call back karta hun kya kehte hain uske liye package ke liye theek hai
Customer: Okay sir okay
Executive: Okay thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a separate package from existing one.

- Wants genuine inquiries for new business.

- Wants someone to explain in person.

- Wants confirmation on monthly inquiry volume.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to create a separate package.

- Executive will check for local representative availability.

- Executive will call back regarding package details.

- Executive asked to save his WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back regarding package details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- package, inquiry, separate account, visiting card
